docstr: `NOT` â€” Logical negation ### Description `NOT` returns the bitwise Boolean inverse of `I`. ### Syntax `RESULT = NOT(I)` ### Arguments . ### Return value The return type is `INTEGER`, of the same kind as the argument. ### Standard Fortran 95 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also IAND, IEOR, IOR, IBITS, IBSET, IBCLR
